title: Career-Integrated Mobile Learning Course for Strengthening Practical Project Management Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A course aiming to acquire immediately applicable project management techniques, conducted through 10-minute modular learning in mobile environments

learning_goals: Learners can create work schedules using project management tools (Agile/Waterfall) in real-world work environments
Learners can develop team-based project risk management plans and propose risk response strategies
Learners can map personal career development roadmaps to project management frameworks to establish actionable plans
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
